product_name: Pearl Izumi EM Trail N1 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Trail N1 Trail-Running Shoes deliver a responsive ride and offer great trail feel and traction with enough protection and cushioning for fast descents on technical terrain. A glovelike fit coupled with EVA midsoles delivers a light and smooth experience. Seamless uppers create supple, lightweight shoes that conform to your feet in technical terrain. Toe caps protect feet from rocks, roots, stumps and other trail hazards. Perforated tongue foam doesn't absorb water while offering great comfort and breathability. Dynamic offset E:MOTION EVA midsoles feature the most minimalistic trail cushioning platform from Pearl Izumi. Energy Foam cushions forefeet upon impact and returns energy back to you. Forefeet rock plates protect feet against stone bruising and rocks. Pearl Izumi Trail N1 Trail-Running Shoes have aggressive, multidirectional carbon rubber outsoles that offer superb traction and abrasion resistance.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi Trail N1 Trail-Running Shoes deliver a responsive ride and offer great trail feel and traction with enough protection and cushioning for fast descents on technical terrain.
